languages.text: {n}Прикрыв глаза, она едва слышно добавляет:{/n} "За ничтожный шанс спасти собратьев... Я готова заплатить эту цену. Но всему есть предел".
{n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."
languages.original_text: {n}Прикрыв глаза, она едва слышно добавляет:{/n} "За ничтожный шанс спасти собратьев... Я готова заплатить эту цену. Но всему есть предел".

traits.locale_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible:{/n} "For this miniscule chance of finding my kinsmen... I'm prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limits."
{n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible:{/n} "For this miniscule chance of finding my kinsmen... I'm prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limits."
{n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."
{n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."
{n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特半眯着眼睛，以几不可察的声音补充道，{/n}“为了我的族人的一线生机……我愿意忍耐这些事情，可我的忍耐也是有极限的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特半眯着眼睛，以几不可察的声音补充道，{/n}“为了我的族人的一线生机……我愿意忍耐这些事情，可我的忍耐也是有极限的。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet entrecierra los ojos y masculla entre dientes:{/n} «Por la más minúscula posibilidad de salvar a mi gente... estoy dispuesta a pagar este precio. Pero todo tiene un límite».
languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet entrecierra los ojos y masculla entre dientes:{/n} «Por la más minúscula posibilidad de salvar a mi gente... estoy dispuesta a pagar este precio. Pero todo tiene un límite».

languages.text: {n}Elle ferme les yeux à moitié et ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Si cela m'octroie une chance, même minime, de sauver mon peuple... je suis prête à me sacrifier pour elle, mais j'ai tout de même des limites. »
languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle ferme les yeux à moitié et ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Si cela m'octroie une chance, même minime, de sauver mon peuple... je suis prête à me sacrifier pour elle, mais j'ai tout de même des limites. »

languages.text: {n}Mit halb geschlossenen Augen fährt sie kaum hörbar fort:{/n} "Für die minimale Chance, die Meinen zu retten ... bin ich bereit, diesen Preis zu bezahlen. Aber alles hat Grenzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit halb geschlossenen Augen fährt sie kaum hörbar fort:{/n} "Für die minimale Chance, die Meinen zu retten ... bin ich bereit, diesen Preis zu bezahlen. Aber alles hat Grenzen."

languages.text: {n}半ば目を閉じ、かろうじて聞き取れるような声で、彼女は付け加える。{/n}「同族を見つけるためなら、この代償を払う覚悟はできている。だが、何事にも限度というものがある」
languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: {n}半ば目を閉じ、かろうじて聞き取れるような声で、彼女は付け加える。{/n}「同族を見つけるためなら、この代償を払う覚悟はできている。だが、何事にも限度というものがある」

languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kısarak zar zor duyulan birkaç kelime daha söylüyor.{/n} "Soyumu kurtarmak için ufacık bir şansım olsa bile... Bu bedeli ödemeye hazırım. Fakat her şeyin bir sınırı var."
languages.original_text: {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "For the minuscule chance of saving my kin... I am prepared to pay this price. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini kısarak zar zor duyulan birkaç kelime daha söylüyor.{/n} "Soyumu kurtarmak için ufacık bir şansım olsa bile... Bu bedeli ödemeye hazırım. Fakat her şeyin bir sınırı vardır."
